dict.acceptation: 作出反应，响应；回报或回复；

sent.orig: A:"Do people respond well to you?"
No one will respond to that ad. Anyway, we'll require a four-year degree, preferable in marketing.
sent.trans: 没有人会理会这种招聘广告的。总之。我们要求四年本科毕业。最好是营销专业的。

sent.orig: Meanwhile, I have chosen not to respond to personal attack launched by MCA President.
sent.trans: 与此同时，我选择不回应马华总会长的人身攻击。

sent.orig: It helps give rise to moral intuition, empathy and the capacity to respond emotionally to music.
sent.trans: 脑岛会引起道德感、共情以及对音乐的情绪反应。

sent.orig: And how might China, an established world centre of manufacturing, respond to global changes?
sent.trans: 作为世界制造中心的中国如何能够响应全球变化成为众多企业家面临的严重课题。
